testcase.classname: Users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User go to register page..............................................passed When User select the type of gender.........................................passed And User enter the first and last name......................................passed And User enter the date of birth............................................passed And User enter the email....................................................passed And User enter and confirm the password.....................................passed And User click on register button...........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: user login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed When user enter "leqaahani@example.com" and "123456"........................passed And User click on login button..............................................passed Then User could login successfully and navigate to home page................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: user login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed When user enter "user@examples.com" and "123456"............................passed And User click on login button..............................................passed Then User couldn't login successfully.......................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: user could reset password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed When user click on forgetPassword...........................................passed Then user navigate to forgetPage and enter his email "leqaahani@example.com".passed And user click on Recovery Button...........................................passed And password will be reset..................................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: user could reset password successfully 2
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed When user click on forgetPassword...........................................passed Then user navigate to forgetPage and enter his email "user@example.com".....passed And user click on Recovery Button...........................................passed And password will not be reset..............................................passed

testcase.classname: user could search for any product
testcase.name: user could search for any product using the product name
testcase.system-out: When user click on search field.............................................passed And user enter the product name.............................................passed Then user find the product in the search result.............................passed

testcase.name: user choose euro
testcase.system-out: When user select euro from the options......................................passed Then all products price will turned to euro.................................passed

testcase.name: user hover on a categories and open sub-Category
testcase.system-out: When user hovers on a category..............................................passed And user select sub-category................................................passed Then user find the sub-category title in the page title.....................passed

testcase.name: user hover on a categories and open sub-Category
testcase.system-out: When user hovers on a specific category.....................................passed And user select specific sub-category.......................................passed And user select specific color..............................................passed Then user find the specific sub-category title in the page title............passed And the specific products with specific color are shown.....................passed

testcase.name: user could select different tags
testcase.system-out: Given user go to searchPage.................................................passed When user select hover on a tag from the popular tag section................passed And user click on the tag...................................................passed Then the products related to this tag will be shown.........................passed

testcase.system-out: When user click on the add to cart button...................................passed And choose the specified features of the product............................passed And confirm adding to shopping cart.........................................passed Then The product added successfully to shopping cart........................passed

testcase.name: user could create successful order
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed When user enter "leqaahani@example.com" and "123456"........................passed And User click on login button..............................................passed Then User could login successfully and navigate to home page................passed When user click on the add to cart button...................................passed And choose the specified features of the product............................passed And confirm adding to shopping cart.........................................passed Then The product added successfully to shopping cart........................passed When user click on shopping cart button.....................................passed And accept the terms of service.............................................passed And click on checkout button................................................passed And enter his data..........................................................passed And choose shipping method..................................................passed And choose payment method...................................................passed And choose payment information..............................................passed And confirm the order.......................................................passed Then the order will make successfully.......................................passed
